Comments_List: Learned how to sparce ancient Japanese poems and languistics.
It was a completely new concept learning ancient grammar in a language I was already fluent in, but the professor and the engaging environment pushed me to learn the challenging material.
Yes. If you know Japanese at an L5 proficiency, he or she should definitely take this course.
